MODULE.name: System
MODULE.HELP_OVERVIEW: is used to either navigate to a URL or call a javascript function when an attached card reader decodes data.
MODULE.MORE_HELP: Only the foreground RhoElements application is given access to the card reader hardware, when an application is sent to the background its state will be saved and it will automatically relinquish control of the card reader. When brought back to the foreground, an application previously using the card reader will have its previous configuration (eg. pinTimeout) reapplied to the card reader automatically.

PROPERTIES.DESC: object supports this properties bla bla bla :

PROPERTY.name: platform
PROPERTY.DESC: Platform where application is running.

PROPERTY.name: hasCamera
PROPERTY.DESC: Is camera available on the device.

PROPERTY.name: screenWidth
PROPERTY.DESC: Screen width in logical pixels (used for set coordinates).

PROPERTY.name: screenHeight
PROPERTY.DESC: Screen height in logical pixels (used for set coordinates).

PROPERTY.name: realScreenWidth
PROPERTY.DESC: Screen width in real pixels.

PROPERTY.name: realScreenHeight
PROPERTY.DESC: Screen height in real pixels.

PROPERTY.name: screenOrientation
PROPERTY.DESC: Current screen orientation.

PROPERTY.name: ppiX
PROPERTY.DESC: Horizontal PPI (Pixels Per Inch).

PROPERTY.name: ppiY
PROPERTY.DESC: Vertical PPI (Pixels Per Inch).

PROPERTY.name: phoneNumber
PROPERTY.DESC: Device phone number.

PROPERTY.name: deviceOwnerEmail
PROPERTY.DESC: Primary email of phone owner (works only on Android).

PROPERTY.name: deviceOwnerName
PROPERTY.DESC: Name(account name) of phone owner (works only on Android).

PROPERTY.name: deviceId
PROPERTY.DESC: Push notifications device ID which may be used to receive push messages.

PROPERTY.name: phoneId
PROPERTY.DESC: Hardware based ID. It depends on capabilities configured for an application and has to remain same even across application uninstall/install.

PROPERTY.name: deviceName
PROPERTY.DESC: Name of device application running on. Examples: '9000' (BB), 'iPhone', 'dream' (Android).

PROPERTY.name: osVersion
PROPERTY.DESC: Version OS of device. Examples: '4.6.0.192' (BB), '3.0' (iPhone), '1.6' (Android).

PROPERTY.name: locale
PROPERTY.DESC: Current device locale.Like 'en', 'ru' etc.

PROPERTY.name: country
PROPERTY.DESC: Current device country code.

PROPERTY.name: isEmulator
PROPERTY.DESC: Is application is running on emulator.

PROPERTY.name: hasCalendar
PROPERTY.DESC: Is calendar support is available.

PROPERTY.name: isMotorolaDevice
PROPERTY.DESC: Is device supports Motorola device capabilities, such as Scanner, etc.

PROPERTY.name: oemInfo
PROPERTY.DESC: The OEM Information string for the terminal.

PROPERTY.name: uuid
PROPERTY.DESC: The Unique Unit IDentifier for the terminal.

PROPERTY.name: applicationIconBadge
PROPERTY.DESC: Set the application icon to have this badge number. Set to 0 (zero) to remove badge.iOS only.

PROPERTY.name: httpProxyURI
PROPERTY.DESC: Client HTTP proxy.

PROPERTY.name: lockWindowSize
PROPERTY.DESC: Lock/unlock the window size change by the user. Implemented only for Windows desktop.

PROPERTY.name: showKeyboard
PROPERTY.DESC: Display\hide software keyboard.

PROPERTY.name: fullScreen
PROPERTY.DESC: Use full screen mode.

PROPERTY.name: localServerPort
PROPERTY.DESC: Port of the local (embedded) HTTP server. This parameter is mainly for debug purposes. If not specified, application will use dynamically selected one.

PROPERTY.name: screenAutoRotate
PROPERTY.DESC: Screen auto rotate.

PARAM.name: applicationUrl
PARAM.DESC: The url of an application to install on the device.

METHOD.name: isApplicationInstalled
METHOD.DESC: Is application installed on the device?

METHOD.name: openUrl
METHOD.DESC: Open the application associated with the URL.

PARAM.name: url
PARAM.DESC: Open the application at this url; behavior may be different on different platforms and depend on installed software.

PARAM.name: appName
PARAM.DESC: The name of the application on the device to run.

PARAM.name: params
PARAM.DESC: The name of the application on the device to run.

PARAM.name: blockingCall
PARAM.DESC: The name of the application on the device to run.

PARAM.name: localPathToZip
PARAM.DESC: The path to the file to be unzipped.

PARAM.name: localPathToZip
PARAM.DESC: The path to the specified zip.

PARAM.name: localPathToFile
PARAM.DESC: The path to the file to be zipped.

PARAM.name: localPathToZip
PARAM.DESC: The path to the specified zip.

PARAM.name: basePath
PARAM.DESC: Base path to the files to be zipped.

PARAM.name: filePathsToZip
PARAM.DESC: List of file paths to be zipped.

METHOD.name: setWindowFrame
METHOD.DESC: Change application window position and size. Implemented only for Windows desktop.

METHOD.name: setWindowPosition
METHOD.DESC: Change application window position and size. Implemented only for Windows desktop.
